Houssos, Nikos
Manghi, Paolo

oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Linking and Contextualizing Publications and Datasets
info:eu-repo/classification/acm/H.3.7 Digital Libraries
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Data are an essential element of the research process. Therefore, for the sake of transparency, verifiability and reproducibility of research, data need to become "first-class citizens" in scholarly communication. Researchers have to be able to publish, share, index, find, cite, and reuse research data sets.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: In: D-Lib Magazine. Editorial, vol. 21 (1/2) pp. 1 - 3. Special issue on Linking and Contextualizing Publications and Datasets. Laurence Lannom (ed.). Corporation for National Research Initiatives, 2015.
